1.0.0.name: wordpress/desktopserver
1.0.0.description: DesktopServer for WordPress eases localhost to live server deployment by publishing hosting provider server details via a protected XML-RPC feed to an authorized administrator only. It also provides assisted deployments to hosting providers that support file system direct.
